summary: Frontend UI Testing - 'Neu' Button Refactoring. All 6 modules (Artikel, Kontrakte, Wiegekarten, Adressen, Fuhren, Rechnungen) successfully refactored to use sidebar instead of popup dialog for creating new entries. All tests PASSED.
critical_code_review_comments: All 6 modules correctly implement the sidebar pattern for new entries
handleNewArtikel/Kontrakt/Wiegekarte/Adresse/Fuhre/Rechnung functions create empty record and open sidebar with isNewRecord=true
handleCancel correctly closes sidebar for new records (sets selected item to null)
Double-click on existing entries opens sidebar for editing (not creating new)
All 'Neu' buttons have correct data-testid attributes: new-artikel-btn, new-kontrakt-btn, new-wiegekarte-btn, new-adresse-btn, new-fuhre-btn, new-rechnung-btn
No dialog/popup elements are created - all use fixed right sidebar panel
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 6 modules have been refactored to use sidebar instead of popup for 'Neu' button. The refactoring is complete and working correctly.

artikel.double_click_edit: PASS - Double-click opens sidebar for editing existing entry
